data.title: Westfield Middle School - Bloomingdale
data.meta_description: Westfield Middle School is a public school in Bloomingdale, Illinois that is part of Bloomingdale School District 13. It serves 494 studentsin 6 - 8 with a student/teacher ratio of 13.0:1.Its teachers have had one project funded on DonorsChoose.
data.text:
About this school

Westfield Middle School is a suburban public school in Bloomingdale, Illinois that is part of Bloomingdale School District 13. It serves 494 students in 6 - 8 with a student/teacher ratio of 13.0:1. Its teachers have had one project funded on DonorsChoose.

Grades Served

6 - 8

Students

494

Teachers

38

Westfield Middle School Contact info is sourced from our partners at MDR Education, and DonorsChoose updates our site ahead of each school year.

(630) 529-6211

149 Fairfield Way

Bloomingdale, IL 60108

DonorsChoose is the most trusted classroom funding site for teachers.

As a teacher-founded nonprofit, we're trusted by thousands of teachers and supporters across the country. Each classroom request for funding was created by a classroom teacher and reviewed by the DonorsChoose team.

See how DonorsChoose works

Westfield Middle School Support on DonorsChoose Last updated Aug 24, 2024

DonorsChoose makes it easy for anyone to help a teacher in need, moving us closer to a nation where students in every community have the tools and experiences they need for a great education.
